references.paper_title: Image style transfer using convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of neural style transfer, a related area to photo stylization, which is directly relevant to the paper's focus.

references.paper_title: Hyperparameter optimization in black-box image processing using differentiable proxies
references.reason: This work proposes a method for tuning parameters of image processing pipelines, which is a directly related problem to the current paper and serves as a comparative baseline.

This paper is also very relevant to the current paper because it proposes a neural approach to photo finishing, which is closely related to the task of goal-conditioned photo finishing tuning discussed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Addressing function approximation error in actor-critic methods
references.reason: This paper presents a significant improvement to actor-critic methods, which are used in the reinforcement learning approach to photo finishing in this paper. It is a foundational paper in reinforcement learning.

references.paper_title: The unreasonable effectiveness of deep features as a perceptual metric
references.reason: This paper introduces LPIPS, a perceptual image similarity metric used in this paper to evaluate the quality of photo finishing results. LPIPS is considered a state-of-the-art perceptual metric for image quality assessment.
